text:
One person died and another injured after a lorry they were in upturned near Pudupatty flyover here on Sunday. Albert (53), cleaner of the lorry, along with driver Mani, both hailing from Tirunelveli, were returning home after dropping off a load of cattle in Krishnagiri when the accident occurred.

Mani reportedly lost control over the vehicle and the lorry upturned off the road. Albert died on the spot and Mani sustained grievous injuries.
title: Killed in accident
